metadata.description: Combined Pixar data from multiple sources

movies.title: Toy Story
awards: Golden Globe Best Motion Picture - Musical or Comedy

movies.title: A Bug's Life
awards: Annie Award for Outstanding Achievement in an Animated Theatrical Feature

movies.title: Toy Story 2
awards: Golden Globe Best Motion Picture - Musical or Comedy
Grammy Award for Best Song Written for a Motion Picture

movies.title: Monsters, Inc.
awards: Academy Award nomination for Best Animated Feature
Academy Award for Best Original Song

movies.title: Finding Nemo
awards: Academy Award for Best Animated Feature
Golden Globe Best Motion Picture - Musical or Comedy

characters.name: Woody
characters.description: Andy's favorite toy and leader of the toys

characters.name: Buzz Lightyear
characters.description: Space ranger action figure who initially believes he's real

characters.name: Sulley
characters.description: Top scarer at Monsters, Inc. who befriends Boo

characters.name: Mike Wazowski
characters.description: One-eyed monster and Sulley's best friend

characters.name: Nemo
characters.description: Young clownfish with a lucky fin

characters.name: Marlin
characters.description: Overprotective father searching for his son Nemo

characters.name: Dory
characters.description: Forgetful but optimistic fish who helps Marlin

timeline.event: Toy Story released - first fully computer-animated feature film
Finding Nemo released - becomes highest-grossing animated film at the time
